TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WebProxy extends System.Object implements class System.Net.IWebProxy, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type WebProxy = class interface ISerializable interface IWebProxy

summary.span: Contains HTTP proxy settings for the class.

span.span: Contains HTTP proxy settings for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含的代理设置的实例都使用以确定是否使用 Web 代理来发送请求。The class contains the proxy settings that instances use to determine whether a Web proxy is used to send requests. 全局 Web 代理设置可以指定在计算机和应用程序配置文件和应用程序可以使用的实例类自定义 Web 代理使用。Global Web proxy settings can be specified in machine and application configuration files, and applications can use instances of the class to customize Web proxy use. 类是基实现接口。The class is the base implementation of the interface. 若要获取 Web 代理类的实例，可以使用任何以下方法：To obtain instances of the Web proxy class, you can use any of the following methods: - 构造函数。The constructor. - 方法。The method. - 方法。The method. 每个这些方法提供实例可进一步自定义; 它们之间的区别是如何，该实例已初始化之前它将返回到你的应用程序。These methods each supply a instance that you can further customize; the difference between them is how the instance is initialized before it is returned to your application. 构造函数将返回的实例类与属性设置为`null`。The constructor returns an instance of the class with the property set to `null`. 当请求使用中此状态下，任何代理的实例用于发送请求。When a request uses a instance in this state, no proxy is used to send the request. 方法返回的实例类与， ，和属性设置为使用由 Internet Explorer 5.5 及更高版本的值。The method returns an instance of the class with the , , and properties set to the values used by Internet Explorer 5.5 and later. 方法返回的一个实例与其类根据 Internet Explorer 和配置文件设置的组合进行设置的属性。The method returns an instance of the class with it properties set according to a combination of Internet Explorer and configuration file settings. 类支持自动检测和代理配置脚本的执行。The class supports automatic detection and execution of proxy configuration scripts. 此功能也称为 Web 代理自动发现 (WPAD)。This feature is also known as Web Proxy Auto-Discovery (WPAD). 使用自动代理配置时，通常名为 Wpad.dat 的配置脚本必须位于、 下载、 编译和运行。When using automatic proxy configuration, a configuration script, typically named Wpad.dat, must be located, downloaded, compiled, and run. 如果这些操作都成功，此脚本将返回可用于请求的代理。If these operations are successful, the script returns the proxies that can be used for a request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将分配实例向实例。The following code example assigns a instance to a instance. 实例使用的代理连接到外部 Internet 资源。The instance uses the proxy to connect to external Internet resources. (有关示例，演示如何使用 WPAD 功能，请参阅的文档类。)(For an example that demonstrates using the WPAD feature, see the documentation for the class.) [!code-cpp[Classic WebProxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebProxy Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebProxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebProxy Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebProxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebProxy Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含代理服务器的地址。The property contains the address of the proxy server. 当未启用自动代理检测，并指定不自动配置脚本，则属性和确定的请求使用的代理。When automatic proxy detection is not enabled, and no automatic configuration script is specified, the property and determine the proxy used for a request. 当属性是`null`，请求绕过代理和直接连接到目标主机。When the property is `null`, requests bypass the proxy and connect directly to the destination host. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的属性对象，包括其。The following code example displays the properties of a object, including its . summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to bypass the proxy server for local addresses.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to bypass the proxy server for local addresses.

value.span: 如果对本地地址不使用代理服务器，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to bypass the proxy server for local addresses; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性确定是否实例访问本地 Internet 资源时使用代理服务器。The setting of the property determines whether instances use the proxy server when accessing local Internet resources. 如果 为 `true`，则对本地 Internet 资源的请求不使用代理服务器。If is `true`, requests to local Internet resources do not use the proxy server. 通过省略句点 （.） 在 URI 中，作为中标识本地请求`http://webserver/`，或访问本地服务器，包括`http://localhost`， `http://loopback`，或`http://127.0.0.1`。Local requests are identified by the lack of a period (.) in the URI, as in `http://webserver/`, or access the local server, including `http://localhost`, `http://loopback`, or `http://127.0.0.1`. 为 `false` 时，所有 Internet 请求都通过代理服务器进行。When is `false`, all Internet requests are made through the proxy server. > [!NOTE] > 对本地主机的 URI 包含句点的请求使用代理服务器。Requests to a local host with a URI that contain a period use the proxy. 若要避免使用代理在这些情况下，创建一个条目中为主机。To avoid using a proxy in these cases, create an entry for the host in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用设置此属性的构造函数和获取此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates calling a constructor that sets this property and getting the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebProxy#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CPP/nclwebproxy.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebProxy#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CS/nclwebproxy.cs#7)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the credentials to submit to the proxy server for authentication.

span.span: Gets or sets the credentials to submit to the proxy server for authentication.

value.span: 实例，它包含要提交到代理服务器进行身份验证的凭据。

span.span: An instance that contains the credentials to submit to the proxy server for authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含发送到响应 HTTP 407 （代理身份验证） 状态代码中的代理服务器的身份验证凭据。The property contains the authentication credentials to send to the proxy server in response to an HTTP 407 (proxy authorization) status code. 在大多数客户端方案中，应使用，这是当前登录用户的凭据。In most client scenarios, you should use the , which are the credentials of the currently logged on user. 若要执行此操作，设置属性设置为`true`而不是设置此属性。To do this, set the property to `true` instead of setting this property. > [!NOTE] > 如果您设置属性设置为凭据以外的其他，并设置属性设置为`true`导致。If you set the property to credentials other than the , setting the property to `true` causes a . 若要防止此情况，必须设置属性设置为`null`之前设置属性设置为`true`。To prevent this, you must set the property to `null` before setting the property to `true`. 同样，不能将此属性设置为任何值时是`true`。Likewise, you cannot set this property to any value when is `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法读取由 Internet Explorer 5.5 和更高版本，存储的非动态代理设置，并创建实例使用这些设置。The method reads the nondynamic proxy settings stored by Internet Explorer 5.5 and later, and creates a instance with those settings. 方法不提取从脚本运行 Internet explorer、 自动配置项，或 DHCP 或 DNS 查找生成的任何动态设置。The method does not pick up any dynamic settings that are generated from scripts run by Internet Explorer, from automatic configuration entries, or from DHCP or DNS lookups. 应用程序应使用属性和方法而不是方法。Applications should use the property and the method instead of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的 URI实例用于访问 Internet 资源。The method returns the URI that the instance uses to access the Internet resource. 比较`destination`的内容，并使用方法。 compares `destination` with the contents of , using the method. 如果将返回`true`，返回`destination`和实例不使用代理服务器。If returns `true`, returns `destination` and the instance does not use the proxy server. 如果`destination`未处于，则实例将使用代理服务器和返回属性。If `destination` is not in , the instance uses the proxy server and the property is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建对象，然后调用此方法以获取资源处于选中状态的代理。The following code example creates a object and calls this method to get the proxy that is selected for a resource. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于确定是否绕过代理服务器访问 Internet 资源时。The method is used to determine whether to bypass the proxy server when accessing an Internet resource. 并属性控制的返回值方法。The and properties control the return value of the method. 返回`true`在任一以下条件： returns `true` under any of the following conditions: - 如果是`true`和`host`是本地的 URI。If is `true` and `host` is a local URI. 通过省略句点 （.） 在 URI 中，作为中标识本地请求`http://webserver/`。Local requests are identified by the lack of a period (.) in the URI, as in `http://webserver/`. - 如果`host`与正则表达式中的匹配。If `host` matches a regular expression in . - 如果 为 `null`。If is `null`. 所有其他情况返回`false`。All other conditions return `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建对象，然后调用此方法来检查是否正确设置跳过列表。The following code example creates a object and calls this method to check whether the bypass list is properly set. [!code-cpp[NCLWebProxy#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CPP/nclwebproxy.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebProxy#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CS/nclwebproxy.cs#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`true`时发出此请求对象应，如果请求服务器进行身份验证使用当前登录用户的凭据。Set this property to `true` when requests made by this object should, if requested by the server, be authenticated using the credentials of the currently logged on user. 对于客户端应用程序，这是在大多数情况下所需的行为。For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios. 对于中间层应用程序，如 ASP.NET 应用程序，而不是使用此属性，通常会设置属性设置为客户端的名义发出请求的凭据。For middle tier applications, such as ASP.NET applications, instead of using this property, you would typically set the property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made. 下表显示了设置的效果值，值的基础属性。The following table shows the effect of setting the value, based on the value of the property. | 值 value| 值 value|效果Effect| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| ||`true`|没有影响。No effect.| ||`false`|将 设置为 `null`。 is set to `null`.| |`null`|`true`|将 设置为 。 is set to .| |任何值，而不是或 `null`Any value other than or `null`|`true` 或 `false``true` or `false`|设置将引发异常。Setting throws an exception.| 如果是`false`，可以更改属性设置为任何凭据。If is `false`, you can change the property to any credentials. 如果是`true`，更改属性从(时设置的值属性设置为`true`) 将引发异常。If is `true`, changing the property from (the value that is set when the property is set to `true`) will throw an exception.

exception.span: You attempted to set this property when the property contains credentials other than the default credentials.

span.span: You attempted to set this property when the property contains credentials other than the default credentials.
